trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around April 27th 2007
Summary: There was a thousand lights on that mother and it just kinda hovered
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from a friends house and as I was coming up over a hill, I saw a disk-shaped object in the air. It had a thousand lights on it which were colored red, white and blue. It disappeared out of my line of sight, but reappeared on top of my house, hovering above it. It flew away after.
